price: 55਼ ਬੇਸ਼ੱਕ ਸਵਰਗਾਂ ਵਾਲੇ ਅੱਜ ਐਸ਼ੋ-ਆਰਾਮ ਵਿਚ ਰੁਝੇ ਹੋਣਗੇ।
arabic: إِنَّ أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ فِي شُغُلٖ فَٰكِهُونَ

version.title: Punjabi translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Punjabi by Arif Halim, published by Darussalam

meta.transliteration: inna aṣḥāba al-janati al-yawma fī shughulin fākihūna
